name: We-Wheelie-Ohs
description:
We-Wheelie-Ohs was made for the GMTK 2021 Game Jam. It features our two characters Bunny Kid and Cereal Kid as they attempt to 'play zombies' in their local toy store. Thanks for playing!

----------

CONTROLS:

Movement - WASD

Shoot Cereal - Left Click

Restart - R

Quit Game - Alt+F4

----------

CREDITS:

Character Art and Intro Sequence by NeoRose

Environment Art and Props by ozotojc (James Cortezano)

Programming done by EthanDean and TheCreepyReaper

VFX by The CreepyReaper
